title: LeBlanc getting reworked AGAIN
body: LeBlanc is to see changes around patch 7.19. She has a history of being reworked over and over, and I think most LeBlanc mains including myself would like to know how riot wants to change her now. Any input?

replies.body:
You can see pro players, streamers and the communities opinion about old and new Leblanc on the linked thread.

Link: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/nmi6agbm-faker-wants-old-leblanc-pro-players-and-sivhd-opinion-on-leblanc?show=new
I still love how {{champion:35}} does LeBlanc's Job and Thematic better then LeBlanc.

Theme? Probs.

JOB? No, fuck no.

LB can't be as tank or as useless as Shaco. But they can both annoy the hell out of everyone.
Edit: I don't actually think Shaco is useless. But for some reason every Shaco main on the forums try to convince everyone he sucks now.

> [{quoted}](name=MysterQ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4uarsMV8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-26T18:14:13.686+0000)
>
> {{champion:13}}  Let's go, let's go.

take this scroll and stick it........ somewhere safe.
I want her model to be updated/retextured :P
Leave her in the dumpster for the next 4 years like Aatrox.
Where exactly does it say she will change in 7.19?
